thread.title: Wintrust Commercial Finance Funds $10.5MM Dredging Deal
thread.title_full: Wintrust Commercial Finance Funds $10.5MM Dredging Deal

title: Wintrust Commercial Finance Funds $10.5MM Dredging Deal
text:
Wintrust Commercial Finance Funds $10.5MM Dredging Deal October 22, 2015, 07:06 AM Related: Marine , Wintrust Commercial Finance , Wintrust Financial 
Wintrust Commercial Finance (WCF) recently provided a $10.5 million term loan to a dredging services company with operations along U.S. coastal waterways and the major U.S. river systems. The transaction is secured by towboats, barges and dump scows and the proceeds of the loan were used to refinance an existing credit facility. Since its inception in April, WCF has approved more than $350 million in financings. WCF is an equipment-focused financing group, headquartered in Frisco, Texas, offering sophisticated loan and lease products to commercial companies throughout the United States and Canada. Focus industries include transportation, construction, manufacturing, energy services, healthcare and restaurant/franchise financing, among others. WCF is a business unit of Wintrust Financial Corporation.
